methods.name: bootstrap
methods.desc: Bootstrap the contract to optin to the fee asset and setup basic variables

methods.name: registerTask
methods.desc: Register a task to be executedOnly app it self can call register task

args.name: registrationFeeDeposit
args.desc: The axfer or pay that deposits the initial funds

methods.name: unregisterTask
methods.desc: Unregister a task when task is deleted

methods.name: executeTask
methods.desc: Execute a task and get the reward

args.name: taskAppCall
args.desc: The call to the task app

args.name: taskAppId
args.desc: The ID of the task to fund

args.name: deposit
args.desc: The pay or axfer to fund the task

methods.name: unfundTask
methods.desc: Remove funds for a taskCreator of the underlying task can remove the funds from the pool

args.name: taskAppId
args.desc: The ID of the task to fund

args.name: amount
args.desc: The amount to withdraw from the pool

methods.name: payment
methods.desc: Creator can send pay/axfer transaction out of the smart contract

args.name: sender
args.desc: Sender. This app id or any rekeyed account to the address of this sc

methods.name: assetTransfer
methods.desc: Creator can send pay/axfer transaction out of the smart contract

args.name: sender
args.desc: Sender. This app id or any rekeyed account to the address of this sc

methods.name: sendOnlineKeyRegistration
methods.desc: Creator can perfom key registration for this LP pool

methods.name: sendOfflineKeyRegistration
methods.desc: Creator can perfom key unregistration for this LP pool
